Kara Latimer
============

**Current Term: November 2025 - November 2028**



Contact Mayor Kara Latimer by email
[klatimer@cibolotx.gov](mailto:klatimer@cibolotx.gov "mailto:klatimer@cibolotx.gov")
or by phone at 210-870-4132.

As mayor of Cibolo, I’m committed to leadership grounded in professionalism, stability, and respect. Cibolo is where I’ve raised my family, built my business, cared for the land, and grown alongside the people who call Cibolo home. My work is to ensure that Cibolo thrives for current residents and future
![Mayor K. Latimer](https://www.cibolotx.gov/Government/Council/Mayor%20Latimer.jpg?t=202512011311370)
generations.

Years of service on city boards and commissions have given me a grounded understanding of how local government functions and how decisions
shape everyday life. I’ve been involved in long-term planning, zoning, development, and policy discussions that impact our neighborhoods and shared spaces. This experience provides the practical knowledge and steady perspective needed to guide Cibolo forward.
